sentences.en: Alain Prost finished third and virtually conceded the world championship.
sentences.cn: 阿兰·普罗斯特以第三名的成绩结束比赛，实际上已经将世界冠军的位置拱手让人。

sentences.en: By the third lap Kinkead had touched 289 m.p.h.
sentences.cn: 到第三圈时，金基德的车速达到了每小时289英里。

sentences.en: Davies finished almost two seconds in arrears for third place.
sentences.cn: 戴维斯落后了差不多两秒，获得第三名。

sentences.en: He had a third examination and was declared unfit for duty.
sentences.cn: 他接受了第三次检查，被告知不宜上班。

sentences.en: Jane's goals helped Britain win third place in the Barcelona games.
sentences.cn: 简的进球帮助英国队在巴塞罗那奥运会上获得了第三名。

sentences.en: Leningrad was the third alien city to offer him a surrogate home.
sentences.cn: 列宁格勒是他在异地安家的第三个外国城市。

sentences.en: Nearly a third of the children were severely underweight.
sentences.cn: 近1/3的孩子体重严重偏轻。

sentences.en: Only a third of these households thought it reasonable to meter water.
sentences.cn: 这些家庭当中只有三分之一认为用水表计量是合理的。

sentences.en: Only about a third of the reinforcements will be regular troops.
sentences.cn: 增援部队中仅有约1/3是常备军。

sentences.en: She finished third in the world cross-country championships in Antwerp.
sentences.cn: 她在安特卫普的世界越野锦标赛上获得了第3名。

sentences.en: Vietnam has emerged as the world's third-biggest rice exporter.
sentences.cn: 越南已跃居世界第三大稻米出口国。

sentences.en: Warwicks leap to third in the table, 31 points behind leaders Essex.
sentences.cn: 沃里克队在排名中蹿升至第3名，落后领先的埃塞克斯队31分。

sentences.en: We felt we might finish third. Any better would be a bonus.
sentences.cn: 我们感觉我们可能会获得第三名，要是能比这个名次更好那就是意外的惊喜了。

sentences.en: We're not even a third of the way there.
sentences.cn: 我们才走了不到三分之一的路。

sentences.en: Welsh international Matthew Postle was third fastest at the halfway point.
sentences.cn: 到半程时，威尔士的世界级选手马修·波斯特尔位居第三。

words.tran_cn: 第十三的；十三分之一的
第三十个的；三十分之一的

phrases.tran_cn: 疲劳讯问；酷刑逼供；拷问；共济会成员的第三级
第三维；立体感；栩栩如生
第三国际（等于 Communist International）
n. 第三者；[语法]第三人称
第三人称；第三人称时使用之代名词与动词
（既非资本主义又非共产主义的）第三种立场
第三次浪潮（指与农业革命、工业革命相对而言的以信息技术革命为标志的高科技时代）

trans.tran_en: coming after two other things in a series

trans.tran_cn: 三分之一，三等学位（英国大学中低于平均水平的学位）
trans.tran_en: one of three equal parts of something
one of three equal parts of something
coming after two other things in a series
